mapper.insert: insert into course (course_ID, name, teacher_ID, description, attend_percentage, project_percentage) values (#{course_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{attend_percentage}, #{project_percentage} )
mapper.select: SELECT takecourse.student_ID,name,account.email FROM (takecourse NATURAL JOIN student) JOIN account ON takecourse.student_ID=account_ID WHERE takecourse.course_ID = #{course_ID} AND takecourse.is_student=#{is_student}
SELECT teachcourse.teacher_ID,name,account.email FROM (teachcourse NATURAL JOIN teacher) JOIN account ON teachcourse.teacher_ID=account_ID WHERE teachcourse.course_ID = #{course_ID}
